Title: AKA Pray for My Patsy
Writer: Hilly Hicks Jr., Melissa Rosenberg (created by), Raelle Tucker
Actors: Krysten Ritter, Rachael Taylor, Leah Gibson, Carrie-Anne Moss
Plot: As Jessica and Dorothy wait anxiously for updates on Trish, a call from Costa brings alarming news. Jeri hatches a plan to get her revenge.
